data.about: The Department of Computer Science and Engineering aims to provide strong academic and research foundations to students in computing. The department offers undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs with a focus on innovation, collaboration, and technical excellence.

message_from_hod.name: Dr. Anoop Jacob Thomas
message_from_hod.message: Welcome to the Department of Computer Science and Engineering. Our department strives to empower students with the knowledge, skills, and confidence to excel in a dynamic and fast-evolving tech world. We promote research and industry partnerships to ensure our students are future-ready.

faculty_members.name: Dr. Anoop Jacob Thomas
faculty_members.researchArea: Medical Image Processing, Neuroimage Processing, Image Processing, Algorithms
faculty_members.Incharge: Campus Networking,Training and Placement, Exam Cell Member, Student Discipline, Hall Booking

lab_facilities.description: Our department has state-of-the-art labs for students and researchers including AI Labs, Networking Labs, and IoT Labs.
